name: Fondation EurActiv
legal: Public Benefit Foundation / Fondation d’utilité publique belge depuis 2012
goal:
1. Fondation EurActiv acts primarily within interest groups working with and alongside the European Institutions, this 'Community of EU actors' brings together people and organisations who shape European policies, in full or in part of their mission. These actors include:
-European institutions, at EU, national and regional levels
-Non-Governmental Organisations as well as think-tanks and foundations
-Companies and their federations
Occupations: such as consulting firms and political parties and groups
-The media.
2. 'To facilitate efficiency and transparency of the Community of European players' for the benefit of civil society stakeholders, that is the goal of the Foundation.
3. The Foundation's activities include:
3a. Providing governance and advocacy for better journalistic media and wider use of EU languages;
3b. Fostering research and innovation, for example, "EU Community": help develop the next era of policy-making. (see http://www.euractiv.com/files/eu-community-support-next-era-eu-policy-making)
3c. Disseminates knowledge through training and events
Level of interests represented:
• European
• national
